con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="ClientInquiryService" targetNamespace="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/ClientInquiryService" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/ClientInquiryService" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/ClientInquiryService" xmlns:Q1="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/messages"> <xsd:import namespace="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/messages" schemaLocation="ClientInquiryServiceMessages.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="getCaseDetails"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="request" type="Q1:MessageCaseDetailsRequestType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getCaseDetailsResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="response" type="Q1:MessageCaseDetailsResponseType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getCaseDetailsFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fault" type="Q1:MessageClientInquiryFaultType"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getCaseEdgInfo"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="request" type="Q1:MessageCaseEdgInfoRequestType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getCaseEdgInfoResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="response" type="Q1:MessageCaseEdgInfoResponseType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getCaseEdgInfoFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fault" type="Q1:MessageClientInquiryFaultType"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getCaseNameInfo"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="request" type="Q1:MessageCaseNameSearchRequestType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getCaseNameInfoResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="response" type="Q1:MessageCaseNameSearchResponseType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getCaseNameInfoFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fault" type="Q1:MessageClientInquiryFaultType"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="searchCaseIndividual"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="request" type="Q1:MessageCaseIndvSearchRequestType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="searchCaseIndividualResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="response" type="Q1:MessageCaseIndvSearchResponseType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="searchCaseIndividualFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fault" type="Q1:MessageClientInquiryFaultType"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="searchCasePrograms"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="request" nillable="true" type="Q1:MessageSearchCaseProgramsRequestType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="searchCaseProgramsResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="response" nillable="true" type="Q1:MessageSearchCaseProgramsResponseType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="searchCasePrograms_fault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fault" type="Q1:MessageClientInquiryFaultType"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="searchCaseIndividualDetails"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="request" type="Q1:MessageCaseIndvSearchRequestType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="searchCaseIndividualDetailsResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="response" type="Q1:MessageSearchCaseIndvDetailsResponseType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="searchCaseIndividualDetails_fault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fault" type="Q1:MessageClientInquiryFaultType"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="getCaseDetailsRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCaseDetails" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCaseDetailsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCaseDetailsResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCaseDetails_faultMsg"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCaseDetailsFault" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCaseEdgInfoRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCaseEdgInfo" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCaseEdgInfoResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCaseEdgInfoResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCaseEdgInfo_faultMsg"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCaseEdgInfoFault" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCaseNameInfoRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCaseNameInfo" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCaseNameInfoResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCaseNameInfoResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getCaseNameInfo_faultMsg"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getCaseNameInfoFault" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="searchCaseIndividualRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:searchCaseIndividual" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="searchCaseIndividualResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:searchCaseIndividualResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="searchCaseIndividual_faultMsg"> <wsdl:part element="tns:searchCaseIndividualFault" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="searchCaseProgramsRequestMsg"> <wsdl:part element="tns:searchCasePrograms" name="searchCaseProgramsParameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="searchCaseProgramsResponseMsg"> <wsdl:part element="tns:searchCaseProgramsResponse" name="searchCaseProgramsResult"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="searchCasePrograms_faultMsg"> <wsdl:part element="tns:searchCasePrograms_fault" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="searchCaseIndividualDetailsRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:searchCaseIndividualDetails" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="searchCaseIndividualDetailsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:searchCaseIndividualDetailsResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="searchCaseIndividualDetails_faultMsg"> <wsdl:part element="tns:searchCaseIndividualDetails_fault" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="ClientInquiryServicePort"> <wsdl:operation name="getCaseDetails"> <wsdl:documentation>Retrieves the Case Name and Address details for a given CASE or APP Number</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:getCaseDetailsRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:getCaseDetailsResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:getCaseDetails_faultMsg" name="fault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getCaseEdgInfo"> <wsdl:documentation>Retrieves the current eligibility information for a given TIERS Case Number or TIERS EDG Number.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:getCaseEdgInfoRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:getCaseEdgInfoResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:getCaseEdgInfo_faultMsg" name="fault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getCaseNameInfo"> <wsdl:documentation>Retrieves the Case and Head of Household individual data for a given CASE or APP Number.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:getCaseNameInfoRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:getCaseNameInfoResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:getCaseNameInfo_faultMsg" name="fault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="searchCaseIndividual"> <wsdl:documentation>Returns the individuals that meet the search criteria along with summaries of the TIERS CASE or TIERS APP information as well as the individuals in the TIERS CASE and TIERS APP</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:searchCaseIndividualRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:searchCaseIndividualResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:searchCaseIndividual_faultMsg" name="fault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="searchCasePrograms"> <wsdl:documentation>This operation takes the case number as input parameter: This operation returns the following information as response: Programs for the given case number along with the program code,status.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:searchCaseProgramsRequestMsg"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:searchCaseProgramsResponseMsg"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:searchCasePrograms_faultMsg" name="fault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="searchCaseIndividualDetails"> <wsdl:documentation>This operation takes the following input parameters: case/application number,EDG number,Individual Id, dob,ssn,last name,first name,middle name,gender,county. This operation returns the following information as response: Individuals that meets the search criteria along with the summaries[address,HOH,case Individuals details,authorized representative etc..] of the TIERS CASE or TIERS APP information as well as the individuals in the TIERS CASE and TIERS APP.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:searchCaseIndividualDetailsRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:searchCaseIndividualDetailsResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:searchCaseIndividualDetails_faultMsg" name="fault"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="ClientInquiryService" type="tns:ClientInquiryServicePort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getCaseDetails"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/getCaseDetails"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getCaseEdgInfo"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/getCaseEdgInfo"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getCaseNameInfo"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/getCaseNameInfo"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="searchCaseIndividual"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/searchCaseIndividual"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="searchCasePrograms"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/searchCasePrograms"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="searchCaseIndividualDetails"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/searchCaseIndividualDetails"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ClientInquiryService"> <wsdl:documentation>This service provides operations for retrieving various types of client data from TIERS</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:port binding="tns:ClientInquiryService" name="ClientInquiryService"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:9080/EAServicesEJB3HttpRouter/ClientInquiryService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/messages" xmlns:msg="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/messages" xmlns:typ="http://common.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/types" xmlns:typ_1="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/types" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://impl.clientinquiry.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/types" schemaLocation="ClientInquiryServiceTypes.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://common.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/types" schemaLocation="CommonTypes.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="IndvSearchType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="dob" nillable="true" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date Of Birth.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="gender" nillable="true" type="typ:GenderCriteriaType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Gender.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="ssn" nillable="true" type="xsd:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Social Security Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="indvId" nillable="true" type="xsd:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Individual Id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="firstName" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>First Name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="lastName" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Last Name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="midName" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Middle Name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CaseIndvSearchRequestType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="msg:IndvSearchType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="caseNum" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="county" nillable="true" type="xsd:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>County.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="edgNum" nillable="true" type="xsd:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EDG Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="fileClearanceType" nillable="true" type="typ:FileClearanceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>File Clearance Type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="caseDetailsRequestType" type="msg:MessageCaseDetailsRequestType"/> <xsd:complexType name="MessageCaseDetailsRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="caseNum" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case&nbsp;Number to use for retrieving the case details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MessageCaseDetailsResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="caseDetailsType" nillable="true" type="typ_1:CaseDetailsType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="messageCaseDetailsResponseType" type="msg:MessageCaseDetailsResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="messageClientIndexFaultType" type="msg:MessageClientInquiryFaultType"/> <xsd:complexType name="MessageClientInquiryFaultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="faultType" type="msg:FaultType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FaultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="errorCode" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation><p> Error Code. </p></xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="errorDetail" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Error Detail.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="errorDescription" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Error Description.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="caseEdgInfoRequestType" type="msg:MessageCaseEdgInfoRequestType"/> <xsd:complexType name="MessageCaseEdgInfoRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="criteriaValue" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The number used to query the current eligibility information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="criteriaType" type="msg:CaseEdgInfoCriteriaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CaseEdgInfoCriteriaType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specifies whether the criteriaValue is a TIERS CASE Number or&nbsp;EDG Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="CASE"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="EDG"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EDG Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="MessageCaseEdgInfoResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="caseEdgInfoType" nillable="true" type="typ_1:CaseEdgInfoType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="caseEdgInfoResponseType" type="msg:MessageCaseEdgInfoResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="MessageCaseNameSearchRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="caseOrAppNumber" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case Or App Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="criteriaType" type="msg:CaseOrAppType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="caseNameSearchRequestType" type="msg:MessageCaseNameSearchRequestType"/> <xsd:simpleType name="CaseOrAppType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specifies whether the number is a case number or an application number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="CASE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="APP"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="MessageCaseNameSearchResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="caseNameSearchType" nillable="true" type="typ_1:CaseNameSearchType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="messageCaseNameSearchResponseType" type="msg:MessageCaseNameSearchResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="MessageCaseIndvSearchRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="caseIndvSearchType" type="msg:CaseIndvSearchRequestType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="messageIndividualSearchRequestType" type="msg:MessageCaseIndvSearchRequestType"/> <xsd:complexType name="MessageCaseIndvSearchResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="caseIndvSearchType" nillable="true" type="typ_1:CaseIndvSearchResponseType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="messageCaseIndvSearchResponseType" type="msg:MessageCaseIndvSearchResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="MessageSearchCaseIndvDetailsResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="caseIndvSearchType" nillable="true" type="typ_1:SearchCaseIndvResponseType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MessageSearchCaseProgramsRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="caseNum" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>CaseNum is type string and it is 10 digit numerical value.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MessageSearchCaseProgramsResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="caseProgramsResponseType" nillable="true" type="typ_1:CaseProgramsResponseType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

Indicates that the individual is inactive. Case Address. Authorized Representatives full name. Head Of House Hold Individual Id. Individual Id. County. Authorized representative phone number. Case phone number. CMA. Program code (FS,TANF,FMA,PM1,PM2,PM3?) where PM1 is Prior Medical month1 just before the FMA application month. Application Registration to insert as "PE" (pending) at the time of request. Disposition to update as "DN" (application denied) / "AP" (approved) / "TN" (Ongoing benefits Terminated). <p> Disaster type for Medicaid. </p> Individual Full Name. Case Number. Indicates what mode that the case is in. Case status. True indicates that all individuals on the case live at the Head of Household address. False indicates that one or more individuals on the case do not live at the same address as the Head of Household. Long Term Care Convert Indicator. Texas Works Convert Indicator. Create System Code. <p> File Clearance Switch - fileClearanceSw. </p> Case Number. Individual Id. File Clearance Switch : Possible values for fileClearenceSw is 'Y', 'N' and null. If the value is null then fileClearenceSw=N.

 

]]> Indicates that the individual is inactive. Address Type. Authorized Representatives full name. Head Of House Hold Individual Id. Individual Id. County. Applicant Phone Information. Authorized representative phone number. Disaster type for Medicaid. File Clearance Switch Head Of House Hold Name. Unique identifier of the application. Indicates the status of the application

]]> Unique identifier of the application. Unique identifier of the individual belonging to the application. The caseName represents a Head Of HouseHold name. Indicates whether anyone in the case is on active duty in the military. <p> CASE household address. If Physical address is not available then it populates the Mailing address for a given CASE or APP number. </p> Case Number. Indicates that the individual is inactive. Head Of Household phone number (Priority in this order:HomePhone/phNum,WorkPhone,OtherPhone). Authorized representative phone number. Special accommodation indicator. Indicates that the individual is inactive. <p> The head of household for the case or app. </p> zipCode of the Applicant/Case address. countyName of the Applicant/Case address. APP or CASE Number. Phone number of the case. The current eligibility information for the criteria specified in the request. Head Of House Hold Individual Id. The TIERS edg for the TIERS edg or case number specified in the request. List of individual's and case information. Indicates the date on which EDBC was run. EDG Number. Payment Period is a window of time within the eligibility span. Payment end date is the end of that window. Payment Period is a window of time within the eligibility span. Payment begin date is the start of that window. Indicates the EDG Status. EDG Individual. EDG group level Notice Reasons. Date by which recertification/review is to be completed The program of assistance for the group. Program Description. <p> Identifies the potentially certified group the individual is placed in. </p> The EDG group will be identified with Simplified reporting types. Indicates if the individual is in the EDG or excluded from the EDG. Individual Identification number. Notice Reasons. Indicates how an individual participates in the CG. Indicates that the individual is inactive. Case Address. Authorized Representatives full name. Head Of House Hold Individual Id. Individual Id. County. Authorized representative phone number. Case phone number. Disaster type for Medicaid Program code (FS,TANF,FMA,PM1,PM2,PM3?) where PM1 is Prior Medical month1 just before the FMA application month. Application Registration to insert as "PE" (pending) at the time of request. Disposition to update as "DN" (application denied) / "AP" (approved) / "TN" (Ongoing benefits Terminated). This element tells about the responseStatus. SUCCESS(2000) in case of results found for the given search criteria,NO_RESULTS_FOUND(2001) in case of no results found for the given search criteria. SUCCESS NO_RESULTS_FOUND append the given search/input parameters. code 2000 means SUCCESS. code 2001 is NO_RESULTS_FOUND.

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://common.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/types" xmlns:typ="http://common.ews.hhs.state.tx.us/types" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="BasicIndividualInfoType"> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="0"> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="name" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="typ:NameType"/> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="dobDt" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date Of Birth.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="genderCd" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Gender.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="indvId" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Individual Id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="ssn" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Social Security number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="age" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Age.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NameType"> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="0"> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="firstName" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>First Name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="lastName" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Last Name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="midName" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Middle Name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="prefixName" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Prefix Name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="sufxName" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Suffix Name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="0"> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrAptNum" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Apartment Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrCity" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case Physical address city.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrCountyCd" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case Physical address county.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrDwellingTypeCd" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Dwelling Type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrRegionCd" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Address region code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrStateCd" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case Physical address state.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrStDirCd" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case Physical address street direction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrStNm" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Street name/Rural Address.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrStNum" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Street Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrStNumFrac" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case Physical address fraction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrStTypeCd" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case Physical address suffix (STREETTYPE).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrTypeCd" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates the type of case address that it is. (Physical, Mailing).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrZip4" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>4 digit zip code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrZip5" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>5 digit zip code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrLine1" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case&nbsp;Physical/Mailing&nbsp;address&nbsp;line1.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="addrLine2" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case&nbsp;Physical/Mailing&nbsp;address&nbsp;line2.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="GenderCriteriaType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="MALE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FEMALE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UNKNOWN"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="PhoneType"> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="0"> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="phNum" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Home Phone Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="workPhone" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Case work phone number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element form="qualified" name="otherPhone" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Other Case phone number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="FileClearanceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation><p> FC - FileCleared; NFC - NotFileCleared; B - Both FileCleared and NotFileCleared; </p></xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="FC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NFC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="B"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>
